interpolation_type._comment: Edit type to change the algorithim used.

codec._comment: Edit codec to change the codec used.

quality._comment: Edit quality to change the quality, higher number the worse. Needs a number between 0 and 51

preset._comment: Edit preset used by ffmpeg. Faster speeds may lower quality.

scale._comment: Edit scale used to output. Must be two numbers seperated by an x

output_location._comment: Location where remux script will output files. Path must be absolute, not relative. If no output is specified, output defaults to relative './Default Output' folder.

custom_upscaler_arguments._comment: Custom upscaler arguments for ffmpeg. Seperate each one with a comma and quotes. Leave empty if you do not know what you are doing.
